channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on island, 22nd November
item.description:
There has been broken glass on the crossing island for months. This poses risk for dog walkers.

item.title: From the start on henwick Road to the school pathway has dog fouling all the way along, 21st November
item.description:
Dog fouling is a joke on this road there needs to be a camera on the corner to catch the person doing it. All school charente are treading it in its all over so its hard to dodge when you have small children and prams.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wendover Road, Eltham
